description:
This is Udemy's #1 best-selling Positive Psychology & Happiness program.  Material in this program was updated as recently as the 15th of May 2016, so join 4,500+ other students enrolled in this life-changing course.   

Become an Even Better Version of YOU!

Imagine how amazing your life will be when you master out-of-control behaviors. Picture how good you will feel about yourself - how much you will accomplish - when you begin to live with the principles within The Science of Happiness.

Life is too short to live confined and small. Being flourishing today!

Trust and integrity are key. That's why only research-validated practices are found in this Happiness Hacking Course.

Through this course you'll:

·        Discover how to eliminate your unhealthy habits through neuroscience  

·        Feel better about yourself

·        Feel energized and motivated to go further

·        Exponentially raise your level of willpower

·        Rewire your brain for sustainable happiness and lasting joy

·        Get UNSTUCK from life's negative circumstances

·        Interrupt bad habits while creating healthy habits .

·        Find greater success in reaching your important goals

This course is a bridge between the Ivory Tower and Main Street - translating rigorous research into actionable plans for an amazing life!

Don't waste another nanosecond wondering if you should enroll. There is absolutely zero risk on your part!  With this course you'll have a 30-day no questions asked guarantee.  If for any reason this program does not help you make life amazing, simply return it to Udemy for a 100% full refund...it's that simple!

So join 4,500 hundred fellow students in this tight knit community of learners and start Feeling Better About Yourself immediately!
title: Happiness: Positive Psychology - Habit & Willpower Mastery
instructors: NLP, Positive Psychology Coach Patrick Howell, Braco Pobric
